mapper.select: select count(*) from t_room r where 1=1

select d.dorm_name dormName,r.*,s.storey_name storeyName,t.roomtype_name typeName,e.emp_name empName from t_room r LEFT JOIN t_dorm d on r.dorm_id=d.dorm_id LEFT JOIN t_storey s on r.storey_id=s.storey_id LEFT JOIN t_roomtype t on r.type_id=t.roomtype_id LEFT JOIN t_emp e on r.cleaner_id=e.emp_id where 1=1
order by r.room_id limit ${key_off},${pageSize}
mapper.update: update t_room set room_name = #{roomName},cleaner_id=#{cleanerId},type_id=#{typeId},dorm_id=#{dormId},storey_id=#{storeyId} where room_id=#{roomId}
